data.text: Ntu mmoka eehaniya Ananiya ni ahanu awe Safira ni ayo chiicho yahothumiha imata aya.
Ni ahanu awe ayo achuwelhaka yoyo mwaha uyo, Ananiya ahovitha nchurukhu nkina waapantte aya ni nkina uyo nkaarwa weesha vamietoni wa akarumiya.
Napeturo nkayaakoha, “Ananiya, woonaka Nakare houhelhani nrima wo unthepiacha Iphumu ya Nlhuku wo uvitha nchurukhu upantte inyu vaathumihilhe inyu imata ilhe?

Imata vaari aya ihinathumihiya yaari yawinyu, mwathumiheke, nchurukhu uyo waari wawinyu, mwahanaa ikuru yo upangelha chaathanana inyu. Nlhatu waani etu, no ulhakelha munrimani mwinyu upanga chiicho? Khamunthempie ntu, Nlhuku phi nthempie inyu!”
Ananiya yeeweke chiicho, nkaawulhuwa vathi nkaakhwa. Attu onkhaye yeeweke yoyo mwaha uyo yahoovacha chinene.
Nkayaawacha ashimirawo nkayaavilhikelha isaanda ntembo ulhe, nkaarwehiya uuvithiyani.
Chavireke isaa taaru, ahanu aya, ahichuwelhaka ittu ikhumelhenlhe, nkayaakelha mpaani mmwe.
Napeturo nkayeerelha, “Nkihimerie, chani, ulha phi nchurukhu wonkhaye upantte inyu vaathumihilhe inyu imata ilhe?” Asafira ayo nkayaakhulha, “Eiyo, phi yoyo wonkhaye.”
Paahi Napeturo nkayeera, “Woonaka mwaatti nhopanga miruku cho ulhikacha Iphumu ya Athithi? Mwiiwelhelheke! Attu arweelhe uwaavithani owannyu alhe, vano ari vankhorani, anouthathani ni inyu chiicho!”
Vahipincheru Asafira nkaawulhuwa vamietoni va Napeturo, nkayaakhwa. Ashimirawo alhe yaweeke, nkayaaphwanya anakhwilhe, nkayaathatha vathe, nkayaavitha wo waatamana ni owannyaya.
Attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye ni attu akina yahokelhiya nipampa veewilhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo.
Akarumiya ahopangacha ithikineha ni cho ushangiha chinchi mwaattuni. Attu onkhaye yanrumelhenlhe Yesu yaari akumaanaka vamoka va ipuwa ya Naselemani.
Khaariwo ntu nkina riyoothe ahaarumelhenlhe aalhikanche uvaraana ni ayo. Anakhalhaka chiicho, attu yahaatotopelha.
Manyaalhopwana ni manyopani enchi yaarumelhenlhe Athithi ahonchereria munlhokoni mwaya.
Ni wo mitheko chaapanga aya akarumiya, attu yaari yaarweehaka areta mmaphironi ni waathalhelha mmikorini ni mmattatoni wiira inakhalhaka irungu ya Napeturo yaakhunelhe vanohalha aya uvira.
Attu enchi o iwani chaatamana Uyerusalemu, yahaawiha areta ni attu o mashoka o unanara. Ni ayo onkhaye yaholhamihiya.
Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe ni akhunanaya o mphingo wa Amasadukayo o vavawo, yahoonelha ihache akarumiya.
Paahi nkayaavaracha akarumiya, nkayaattuka ujera yuulhupalhe.
Nansho uhiyu nnepa wa Athithi nkawaahulha milhako cho ijera, nkaakumiha vathe, nkeerelhacha,
“Nrwaacheke mweemelhe Inupa ya Nlhuku mwaahimeriacheke attu mwaha wonkhaye wo ulha ukumi wo naanano ulha.”
Akarumiya nkayaarumelhelha. Wichishuru nkayaakelha Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkayaachokholha weettuchiha attu.
Nansho yayo attu ayo yaphiyeke wowo, khayaapwannye anamitheko ujeerani mmwe. Paahi nkayaahokolhia, nkayaahimiacha wiira,
“Naphiyeke ujerani naaphwannye ijera inatteiye nti ni attu olhita alhitelhelhaka milhako. Nansho nahulheke nlhako khanamphwannye ntu riyoothe mpaani.”
Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni nholhelhi a attu olhitelhelha Inupa ya Nlhuku veewilhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo nkayaashanga ahichuwelhaka mwaha waapantte akarumiya.
Nkaawa ntu mmoka nkeerelha, “Nkeewani mwaatti! Alhe attu yaattunke inyu ujerani alhe, naanano va arii Inupa ya Nlhuku, aneettuchihacha attu.”
Paahi nholhelhi olhita Inupa ya Nlhuku vamoka ni anamitheko awe nkayaarwaa uwaakushani. Nansho khayaavanre wo machiri, ukhalhawaya yaari yoovaka attu wiira yanaatiya malhuku.
Paahi akarumiya nkayaakushiya ni uwiihiya, nkayeemeshiya uholho vankutaanoni. Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nkayaakoha,

“Nahoochiichihani chinene wiira nhiilhehere wo nchina no ulha ntu ulha, nansho mwooneke chinre inyu vano! Nhowanelhiha meettuchiho inyu Uyerusalemu wonkhaye ni unihambulhiha vachulhu iphome awe yolha ntu ulha.”
Vavawo Napeturo vamoka ni akarumiya akina alhe, nkayaakhulha, “Nlhuku phi ninothananiya ihu umwiiwelhelha hii, kuhiwe ntu.
Nlhuku a manyaapwiiya ihu ahonhihimusha Yesu mwankhomelhenlhe inyu vansalaabani.
Nlhuku a manyaapwiiya ihu ahommwelhiha mpaka wiimonono wawe, nkaakhalha Nholhelhi ni Moopolhi, wiira attu o Uisraeli akhorome, ahiyereriye uwonya waya.
Hiyaano phi o uhimiechesha yoyo mwaha uyo, vamoka ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku anovahiya aya attu anonrumelhelha.”
Attu onkhaye vankutaanoni vawo, yeeweke yayo, nkayaarushiya chinene, nkayaathanana weeva.

Nansho Afarisayo amoka owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa aathimichiya chinene ni attu onkhaye, eehaniya Nagamalieli, nkayeemelha uholho vankutaanoni vawo. Nkaalhehera wiira akarumiya alhe akumihiye vathe kaaye.
Yamalheke nkayeerelha attu vankutaanoni valhe, “Aisraeli nanaka, muupuwelheke kaaye nhinaaya upanga yeyo nnothanana inyu waapangelha alha attu alha iyo!

Nnowuupuwelha wiira katashi vakani, ahokhumelhelha ntu mmoka eehaniya Theuda. Yoyo aheepanga orera nrima ni attu yaatameria imia ncheshe yahonttwara. Nansho aheeviya, attu onkhaye yanttwara nkayaamwariacha.
Kaanyuma tho, ikatema yo waalhakelhiya attu ilhe, ahokhumelhelha Nayuda o Ugalilaya. Ni ayo ahaapatta attu o waattwara, nansho ni ayo chiicho nkeeviya, attu yaatwara nkayaamwariacha.
Ni mii vano, kinouhimeriani chiicho wiira nhaapangelhe alha attu alha ittu iriyoothe, mwaahiyeke! Yakhalhaka ulha mwaha aya ulha uchokholhihiye ni ntu, unoomalha uneneru.
Nansho yakhalhaka uchokholhihiye ni Nlhuku, mwaatti khannooria waawulhusha, nneephwanyeke mwaanaka ni Nlhuku.”
Nkayeehana akarumiya alhe va ipuwa, nkayaalhehera wiira yaatiye mikwaju ni waamukiya wiira ahiittuchihe tho wo nchina na Yesu, yamalheke nkayaahiya arwaacheke.
Paahi etu, akarumiya nkayaathama vankutaanoni valhe anateelhiye mirima chinene, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahoona wiira ahophwanelhiya wuulhihiya muru wo nlhatu no nchina na Yesu.
Kila nihuku nkayaathepa weettuchiha attu ni uhimiacha Malhove Orera a Yesu wiira phi Kuristo nhina Inupa ya Nlhuku ni mmanupani mwa attu.
